traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The jackalwere has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackalwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The jackalwere makes two Rend or Slam attacks.
